website_summaries.verdict: A great way to create a "snow filled" Christmas if the weather does not cooperate.
pros: A visually appealing solution to snow falling in the night sky via LED lighting
cons: Some users report problems connecting multiple strands with standard power sources

customer_reviews.title: Nice holiday lighting - can't wait to see how it look with some snow!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. I wanted a unique blue icicle-like effect for christmas lighting, and these didn't disappoint. Installation was a breeze and the effect is just spectacular. Very impressed with the appearance of these lights. Only issue I had was the initial installation power supply used worked for one on/off cycle, and then did not work anymore. Not a problem, as each strand has its' own accompanying power supply, so I just swapped it for another and been working fine ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ward

customer_reviews.title: Suprising Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Came upon to this product as a surprise and not knowing how it would end up. The product surprising lovely and great. The LED light was great and looks lovely on the front porch even before the holiday season. Would recommend get at least two at a time because of the length (or maybe we just have long porch). However, would totally recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of lights on a strand- buy enough for your project
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright lights but I needed 4 strands for a small tree and it still looks like it could've used more. A hassle to hang to make look just right so don't plan on it being a quick job. Not sure why the plug is NOT waterproof so take proper precautions. Wrap in electrical tape or a bag to keep dry-haven't had any problems yet in the rain and snow this year, I'll probably buy some more next year if they hold up this season. We bought the multi color and so happy I did. It matches my led color strands perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These lights work perfectly and look very nice for what they are. The strings aren't super-long so if you have a large area to cover, you might want to order more than one set. They easily connect together so you can make a longer run. They are LED so they don't take a lot of electricity but they are pretty bright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These lights are hanging from a short tree in my front yard and the fit in perfectly with the rest of my Christmas decorations and they are beautiful. I've received so many compliments about them
customer_reviews.text: Unknown to me I connected the lights incorrectly, so they didn't work when hung. I contacted Cheryl at Paragala and they explained what was wrong and provided the instructions I needed to correct my error. These lights are hanging from a short tree in my front yard and the fit in perfectly with the rest of my Christmas decorations and they are beautiful. I've received so many compliments about them. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Christie King

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as promised
customer_reviews.text: These are currently hanging on my front porch. They were easy to install and work great. They take a few minutes to randomize and look great from all angles.
customer_reviews.author: McA

customer_reviews.title: Great-looking icicle lights
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a couple of sets of these lights to string together (as you can chain them to each other) in order to hang them from our front porch. They really look effective at night, giving a "dripping icicle" kind of look. They're light enough to be able to hang them from cheap plastic hooks, and survived quite a few weeks of very cold weather here in New York!
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: I put them up immediately and love them! /Users/Janelle/Desktop/video-1480980249 copy
customer_reviews.text: These lights are stunning! I got two sets of the warm white. I have them in my front window in two rows (8 lights in each row) They come from overseas so it took about one month to arrive BUT.... I put them up immediately and love them!
customer_reviews.author: arttcher123

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Unique Christmas Lights!
customer_reviews.text: These look and work as advertised. For the price, you really can't go wrong with these. I saw some reviews about them not working so I was a little concerned, but they have worked great for me. I've had them on continuously (inside) for about two weeks now, and they haven't gotten hot and are still working!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Ellis

customer_reviews.title: These are the long falling star tubes. They look awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Made Christmas in my front yard remind me of driving down 2nd December Street in Dubai. The lighting looked great and performed well. No issues with the packing. A few of the bottom tube plugs fell out, but I just caulked them back in with a little clear caulk and all was right again.
customer_reviews.author: DrSparx

customer_reviews.title: Great for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 sets of these as an alternative to regular Christmas lights for my deck. I was surprised at how easy they were to put up. A neighbor from across the creek could see them and loved them, as did I. They were put up at Thanksgiving, left on 24 hours a day until I uplugged them New Years Day. I will definitely reorder again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Denise E.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Happy with these. Didn't realize when I bought them that I bought the white lights and not tel he blue. However they are still a nice color. 8 lights isn't enough and so we would need at least one more set to go the length of our front porch. But since they are almost $20.00 each inwill probably wait until next year to but another set.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: These lights are pretty when they work
customer_reviews.text: These lights are pretty when they work. Before you order them, you need to know that the lights themselves are waterproof; however, the power supply is NOT. We found this out after our first rain. We switched out the power supply with another one. We wrapped it up very tightly with electrical tape to keep the water out. After our first freeze, the 2nd power supply quit working. We had to switch it to another power supply and have wrapped this one in a baggy taped up with electrical tape. It boggles my mind that someone would make a item for outdoor use and not make the power supply waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas lights in 35 years of life
customer_reviews.text: These lights are probably the best money I have ever spent in 35 years of buying Christmas tree lights they are absolutely beautiful and you cannot beat the price if I were going to complain my only complaint would be that they could be a little larger
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Martinez Lavin

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights overall
customer_reviews.text: Nice effect, but you'll need 3 or more strings for the effect seen in the featured photo. 2 of mine tubes have accumulated about a qtr inch of water inside (I'm afraid to try to open them for draining), but to date they still work. I like them, but they are really just for the effect, not for actual lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Fletch

customer_reviews.title: Not really 'white'
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in white but they really look blue/very LED type lighting effect. I like more natural colors. If you are looking for something natural looking this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: We had a rain the other day and two of the three strings we bought stopped working. When we unplugged the first one, water dripped out of the controller box. The circuit board was sitting in a pool pf water. We got the other one working but one is definitely dead. The lights are great, when they work, and we've had a lot of compliments. But now the neighbors are asking why one of our trees isn't lit. All in all, we got about one month's use out of it before it died.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Mo

customer_reviews.title: Already burnt out
customer_reviews.text: Less than a month of use at night only and one strand has already burnt out and will not work. I knew they were cheap but I should have just purchased them from wal-mart.
customer_reviews.author: NCSUfan2013

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed - Very Misleading!
customer_reviews.text: Poorly constructed and misrepresented in the description. The individual tubes are connected by very fragile 20 gauge wire, the hanging loops are very small, the spacing between tubes do not allow for much elevation difference. If you want to recreate one of the trees in there display picture, you would need at least 10 strings.
customer_reviews.author: Marc I.

customer_reviews.title: Plug them in the day you receive... I waited and neither of mine worked !
customer_reviews.text: I just plugged my lights in to decorate for Christmas, one set is very dim, and the second set doesn't light up at all...packaging is gone..product seems poorly made, I expect there is a pinch or broken connection somewhere...quality control might be a good idea before shipping..
customer_reviews.author: MVP

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light effects
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Beautiful light effects. Mounted around my patio for Christmas. Easy to install. Well worth the money and very happy with it. Will recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Felix L. Vega Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my time
customer_reviews.text: We strung these lights together before attempting to hang them outside in front of our house. As I plugged one set into another, there was no power to the second string. We replaced that one with another, and then that string stayed lit for only a few seconds. Too risky for us, with issues in at least 3 of the 5 strings we bought. Additionally, one prong from the outlet plug was completely broken off. I’m glad we didn’t waste the time actually hanging them. I bought these for my husband’s birthday, and they greatly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product Quality is Like the Flip of a Coin!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 4 and 1 stopped working within 1 month of use and asked for a replacement!!! I was sent one that had the same problem of not all working from the get go!!! When I tried to get another one, I was ignored most likely because the return window was over!!! Therefore, do not order these from this seller without taking a chance!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful on my Christmas tree
customer_reviews.text: I saw these while on vacation and really wanted them but they we expensive. I checked Amazon and it was half the price. I ordered two and put them on my Christmas tree and loved them. I will definitely order more.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: The product performs as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Fun lights. Flexible string, I made a great eight pointed star.
customer_reviews.author: Woad

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY DISAPPOINTED!!! The first strand of lights work but when you hook a second strand the first goes very dim and maybe one or two lights of the second work but barely. The description says you can hook multiple strands together. NOT!!!! Very bummed after a lot of work went into decorating to have these fail! BAD PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: They didn't even make it till Christmas! One der ...
customer_reviews.text: They didn't even make it till Christmas! One der stopped working a week after we put them up and the other set stopped working on Christmas Eve! Once they were up we were way too busy to take them down- so we had to endure seeing non-working lights hanging in our tree. After spending $36 for nothing but an eye sore- I wouldn't promote these cheap set for anyone!!! DONT DO IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking meteor light. Have 5 set's strung together.
customer_reviews.text: I put 5 set's strung together in my Christmas Display. So far so good they look cool. So far so good time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking lights, good price, they fit end to end very nicely. The only down side (and it is a very minor one to me) is the tube the lights sit in is very thin and feel fragile. Once they are hung, I don't see it as a problem. I'll just be careful storing them.
customer_reviews.author: Syd & Jack

customer_reviews.title: Lights
customer_reviews.text: Love the lights work great even through rain and snow
customer_reviews.author: Woodn

customer_reviews.title: These look great at night
customer_reviews.text: These look great at night. Used as Christmas lights tied to limbs of a large tree. They all start on a small offset from each other then become random in about 30 seconds. They are priced just right.
customer_reviews.author: KevAustin1

customer_reviews.title: They look and work great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for this product for a while and have found many at a much higher cost. I was a little skeptical of these since they are reasonably priced. I couldn't be any happier. They look fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast and prompt, all items arrived in damaged, and are in perfect working order, very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Wyldechylde

customer_reviews.title: They are ok
customer_reviews.text: Not Impressed, lights are to close to each other, when connecting more than two strings of 8 lights, last one does not work well

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I received this light very quickly and immediately hanged at home. The child liked it and was driving every day.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, almost requires electrician to put together with positive ...
customer_reviews.text: beautiful, almost requires electrician to put together with positive and negative ends. Biggest complaint was I had to wait a year to use since they did not arrive for 3 months.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are nice but very delicate and they are hard to put up

customer_reviews.text: Rain flash light ‘ pertty and easy ! good pirce

customer_reviews.title: Bright and colorful
customer_reviews.text: Fun lights to put in my windows for the holidays.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: They are supposed to be weather proof, but only worked for one week. After a heavy storm with some snow they stopped working. I am returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: DOROTHE DOYLE

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lights. Using them inside
customer_reviews.text: Amazing lights. Using them inside. Got to get a second set as they are so different and cool to look at
customer_reviews.author: tommydelsol

customer_reviews.title: Works well and adds interest to holiday display.
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. Can't stop watching them. They look good in my front window and add interest and movement to my holiday display.

customer_reviews.title: etc with a beautiful cascading vision of lights
customer_reviews.text: inexpensive way to decorate house, trees, etc with a beautiful cascading vision of lights.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Work good and look great, just not weatherproof
customer_reviews.text: Worked good and look great. No 5th star since the controller is not the least bit waterproof. Use a ziplock or food container to keep the weather off I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved them all the neighbors commented on how beautiful like looked

customer_reviews.title: Hypnotic!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome lights! We've received a lot of comments on them. Hung in a tree they look great. I intend to add a few sets.

customer_reviews.title: but still fun to look at
customer_reviews.text: You need about ten of these to make any sort of impact. Since I got one, it was a bit disappointing, but still fun to look at.

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: These are great lights. Had great comments from those that saw them!
customer_reviews.author: EdK

customer_reviews.title: It takes a lot of strings to get the effect.
customer_reviews.text: Very interesting but very expensive to get the full effect of these lights. So many people have commented and ask where I got them. I absolutely love them.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Bray

customer_reviews.title: Cheap immitation not suited for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.text: The lights looked great until the first time the lights were exposed to rain. when i finally took down all the Christmas decorations most of the tubes had water inside and rust was noticeable on multiple areas. This is a cheap imitation that is not meant for outdoor use. Also the description mentions you can tie up to 4 units together which does not work. The voltage drop was too much which made the 3rd set barely visible.
customer_reviews.author: Victor G.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Could not string together for couldn't handle the power. Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Tammy shannon

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights
customer_reviews.text: This is the second year we purchase these lights and love them. We got them last year and the comments from everyone was so positive that we added even more this year. They are the highlight of our decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks great. Make sure you cover all plug connections to prevent water from entering when it rains.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Hopson

customer_reviews.title: Should be better
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these on 12/10/16 and they showed up pretty quickly. I then hung them (two strings) on the tree, but when I plugged the two strings together the only way the plug fit properly, it killed the lights. I then reversed the plug and they worked only you can not get the water proof cap to screw on . Also on Christmas night one whole tube quit lighting up.

customer_reviews.title: Great lights for any occasion
customer_reviews.text: They really look amazing. So easy to connect multiple sets.

customer_reviews.text: Beautiful 😍 this style of lights was my husband's idea and I must say it was a great choice
